description: A voyage through the solar system.
name: Voyage to the Outer Planets and Beyond

review.name: Low-res view of the solar system
review.reviewBody:
No real plot, just a tour of the solar system as the title suggests. What is awful about this movie is the terrible low-resolution of the EP (or SLP) tape. For the price, it could have been done at high-res or SP.

Some special effects are used, but they are definitely of the high school hacker variety.

Even Asimov is blurry in this movie.

Everything is blurry in this movie.

The Mercury and Venus footage is made-up and quite hokey.

The Jupiter footage is the best part of this movie, looking almost real.

There is nothing more worth saying.
